html:
Dec 14 (Reuters) - The following are the top stories on the New York Times business pages. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.


- The Labor Department has opened a whistle-blower investigation into Apple AAPL.O, a department spokeswoman said Monday, adding to a litany of recent charges made to federal and state agencies about the company by current and former employees. https://nyti.ms/3DUajN8


- Federal and state officials said on Monday they would investigate the collapse of an Amazon AMZN.O delivery depot in Edwardsville, Ill., that was struck by a tornado on Friday, killing six people. https://nyti.ms/3dPdYBc


- A lawyer for former U.S. President Donald Trump urged a federal appeals court to quash a congressional subpoena seeking years of financial records from his accounting firm, arguing on Monday that the demand is too broad and could open the door for lawmakers to routinely harass and intimidate future presidents. https://nyti.ms/3dKVtOm


- The Supreme Court on Monday refused to block New York's requirement that healthcare workers be vaccinated against the coronavirus even when they cite religious objections. https://nyti.ms/3yCa88h


(Compiled by Bengaluru newsroom)

(( globalnewsmonitoring@thomsonreuters.com ))
